channel.title: Refresh it pl0x

item.title: Refresh it pl0x
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

Hey guys, right heres the problem, my writeWildyLevel wont budge, what i mean is it says at “Level: 0” and doesn’t refresh, heres my current code public int WildyLevel = 0; public int leftwild = 0; public boolean InWildrange = false; public boolean inSafezone = false; public void WriteWildyLevel() { if (isInBarrows()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@whi@¤-Barrows-¤", 199); } else if (inSafezone()){ writePlayers(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("Level: "+WildyLevel, 199); } }

Pl0x someone help thanks
